prompts: Create a psychic-type Pokemon that has a sleek, humanoid form and glowing features.
Imagine a powerful Pokemon with a purple color scheme and strong, muscular arms.
Design a legendary Pokemon with a mysterious aura, featuring psychic abilities and elegant movements.
Generate a unique Pokemon that blends technology and psychic powers with a futuristic appearance.
Show me a bipedal Pokemon with psychic abilities and a regal stance, exuding confidence.
Make a creature that embodies the essence of psychic energy with a majestic, ethereal look.
Give me a Pokemon that showcases both strength and intelligence in its design and color palette.
